title: PEOPLE DATA: HOW TO USE AND APPLY HUMAN CAPITAL METRICS IN YOUR
description: Author: Tine Huus Edition: 2015 edition Publication Date: May 14, 2015 Publisher: Palgrave Macmillan Pages: 182 pages Format: pdf Size: 886K --- People are an organizations` biggest asset and easily amount to 30% of company costs so even small improvements can have a bottom-line impact. A unique toolkit to an important new trend, People Data demystifies and simplifies the process of understanding and working with human capital metrics. --- http://dlfeb.com/book/people-data-how-to-use-and-apply-human-capital-metrics-in-your-company-palgrave-pocket-consultants/
